properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 2:16AM EST until January 18 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Charleston WV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a
light glaze.

* WHERE...Lewis and Upshur Counties.

* WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will initially start as a
period of freezing rain early Saturday morning. A change to rain
is expected by late morning, if not earlier.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Additional information can be found at
https://www.weather.gov/rlx as well as on our Facebook and
Twitter pages.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING
